titles.title: Blind Workers' Wage Equity Act

To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to clarify that individuals with impaired vision or blindness are not to be covered by special certificates for employment under section 14(c) of such Act.

bill.summary: 3/7/1994--Introduced. Blind Workers' Wage Equity Act - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that individuals with impaired vision or blindness are not to be covered by special certificates for employment of handicapped workers at a lower than minimum wage.
